testcase.name: US_005 TC_01 User should not be able to login with invalid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to "https://gmibank.com/".....................................passed And user click to account menu..............................................passed And user click on sign in...................................................passed And user click on username checkbox.........................................passed And user enter a invalid username...........................................passed And user click on password checkbox.........................................passed And user enter a valid password.............................................passed And user click on Sign in button............................................passed Then verify if the user sign in.............................................passed

testcase.name: US_005 TC_02 User should not be able to login with valid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to "https://gmibank.com/".....................................passed And user click on account menu..............................................passed And user click on sign in...................................................passed And user click on username checkbox.........................................passed And user enter a valid username.............................................passed And user click on password checkbox.........................................passed And user enter a invalid password...........................................passed And user click on Sign in button............................................passed Then verify if the user sign in.............................................passed

testcase.name: US_005 TC_03 User should not be able to login with invalid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to "https://gmibank.com/".....................................passed And user click on account menu..............................................passed And user click on sign in...................................................passed And user click on username checkbox.........................................passed And user enter a invalid username...........................................passed And user click on password checkbox.........................................passed And user enter a invalid password...........................................passed And user click on Sign in button............................................passed Then verify if the user sign in.............................................passed

testcase.name: US_005 TC_04 User with invalid credentials should be given an option to reset their password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to "https://gmibank.com/".....................................passed And user click on account menu..............................................passed And user click on sign in...................................................passed And user click on username checkbox.........................................passed And user enter a valid username.............................................passed And user click on password checkbox.........................................passed And user enter a invalid password...........................................passed And user click on Sign in button............................................passed Then user click on option to "Did you forget your password?" to reset password.passed

testcase.name: US_005 TC_05 User should be given the option to navigate to registration page if they did not register yet
testcase.system-out: Given user go to "https://gmibank.com/".....................................passed And user click on account menu..............................................passed And user click on sign in...................................................passed Then user click on option to "Register a new account" to register...........passed
